name: Barbasim
description:
‎‎‎Web version available at https://luuknoverraz.nl/barbasim


Barbasim is a creature simulation made with the Unity engine where little 'Barba' creatures interact with each other on a randomly generated island. Every Barba has unique stats and their own name. You can view the island from different angles and follow Barba's.

Made by Luuk Noverraz
